001package reversi;
002
003import java.awt.Color;
004
005import javax.swing.plaf.ColorUIResource;
006
007public class Piece extends Object {
008    private Integer color;
009    private Integer number;
010    private Color uiColor;
011
012    public Piece(Integer color){
013        this.color = color;
014        this.number = 0;
015        this.uiColor = uiColorRandom();
016        return;
017    }
018
019    public Color uiColorRandom() {
020        if (color == 1)
021            return Color.WHITE;
022        if (color == 2)
023            return Color.BLACK;
024        int r = (int) (Math.random() * 256);
025        int g = (int) (Math.random() * 256);
026        int b = (int) (Math.random() * 256);
027        Color color = new ColorUIResource(r, g, b);
028        return color;
029    }
030
031    public void increase() {
032        this.number++;
033        return;
034    }
035
036    public void decrease() {
037        this.number--;
038        return;
039    }
040
041    public Integer getColor() {
042        return color;
043    }
044
045    public Integer getNumber() {
046        return number;
047    }
048
049    public Color getUIColor(){
050        return uiColor;
051    }
052}
